1: <pb/><t>Chik'ijilaj ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ix ri ix aj caj;</t> <t>chik'ijilaj ri u cuinem</t> <t>xukuje' ri u juluwem ri Ajawaxel,</t>
2: <t>chiya' u k'ij ri je'lalaj u bi'</t> <t>ri Ajawaxel;</t> <t>chik'ijilaj ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>pa ri je'lalaj u k'ijilabal.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Ri u ch'abal ri Ajawaxel cäxojlin</t> <t>puwi' ri plo;</t> <t>ri Dios ri nim u k'ij</t> <t>are cäbanow ri cakulja:</t> <t>¡ri Ajawaxel c'o puwi' ri nimalaj plo!</t>
4: <t>Ri u ch'abal ri Ajawaxel c'o u cuinem;</t> <t>ri u ch'abal ri Ajawaxel c'o u chuk'ab;</t>
5: <t>ri u ch'abal ri Ajawaxel quebujak'ij</t> <t>tak ri chacalte'.</t> <t>Ri Ajawaxel quebujak'ij</t> <t>tak ri chacalte' re ri Libano.</t>
6: <t>Quebuyicopisaj tak ri juyub Libano</t> <t>xukuje' ri Sirion;</t> <t>¡cuban chque chi quech'opinic</t> <t>jacha' ama'ib tak wacax</t> <t>xukuje' alaj ama'ib tak wacax!</t>
7: <pb/><t>Ri u ch'abal ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>quebuq'uiak rak' tak k'ak';</t>
8: <t>ri u ch'abal ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>cubano chi cayicop ri chaki'j uwo sak;</t> <t>¡ri Ajawaxel cubano chi cayicop</t> <t>ri chaki'j uwo sak re Cades!</t>
9: <t>Ri u ch'abal ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>cuban chque ri ati'tab tak masat</t> <t>chi quebalanic,</t> <t>cuq'uis tzij paquiwi' ri räx che'</t> <t>ri e c'o pa tak ri c'ache'laj.</t> <t>Conojel c'ut caquiya' na u k'ij</t> <t>chupam ri rachoch.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Ri Ajawaxel cätakan puwi' ri jäb;</t> <t>¡ri Ajawaxel are' ajawinel</t> <t>ri c'o u takanic chbe k'ij sak!</t>
11: <t>Ri Ajawaxel cuya' u chuk'ab</t> <t>ri u tinimit;</t> <t>ri Ajawaxel cutewichi'j ri u tinimit</t> <t>ruc' jamaril.</t>
